Darwin departed for Cape Frio

along with six others.

I should be able to collect lots of plants and insects during this trip

to Cape Frio.

I’m on my way home after participating in a festival, so it’s great having a companion

on the way back.

I doubt you’ll ever be bored as long as I'm around.

Ha ha!

A firefly!

It’s amazing how they glow.

These are Western fireflies. When stimulated, they glow very bright, but then,

after some time has passed,

the rings around their bodies begin to dim.

76
